Name: Fake Racing
About the game: Fake Racing is an indie racing game with an unusual visual style. Features The monochrome pixelized renderer was created specifically for this game. It uses a custom 3D-dithering shading technique to achieve a retro visual style with one of the three available monochrome palettes. Fake car physics. Non-realistic but fun for casual play. Attack from the Air: compete not only against your opponents, but also against the enemy helicopter. This mode creates an extra challenge for the race leaders, making the race more intense. Four tracks with reverse and mirror options. Game modes Attack from the air; Elimination; Classic race. Virtual Reality This game has full VR support with following controls: VR controllers (steering by hands); Gamepad (steering by thumbstick); Keyboard.
